newsitem.title: UK: Clarke says UK to meet Maastricht criteria in 1997.
newsitem.headline: Clarke says UK to meet Maastricht criteria in 1997.

text.p: Chancellor of the Exchequer Kenneth Clarke said Britain will meet Maastricht convergence criteria on debt and the public sector deficit in 1997.

"My decisions in this budget also mean that, by happy coincidence, we will meet the Maastricht debt and deficit criteria in 1997, and we will do even better than that in the medium term," Clarke told Parliament in his annual budget speech. -- London Newsroom +44 171 542 7717
